body_html:
@black-puppydog yes it corresponds to input images of varying size in computer vision
I am trying to implement this paper http://research.microsoft.com/pubs/226585/cikm2014_cdssm_final.pdf and I would like to avoid making a for loop over mini batch examples.

body:
@black-puppydog yes it corresponds to input images of varying size in computer vision
I am trying to implement this paper http://research.microsoft.com/pubs/226585/cikm2014_cdssm_final.pdf and I would like to avoid making a for loop over mini batch examples.
